channel.title: Whonix Gateway desktop turned black instead of normal blue color
channel.description:
When starting Gateway I noticed the desktop background color is black for the first moments, then turns the normal blue color. However, starting yesterday during startup the desktop color turned black and now it's staying the black color. No such issue on Workstation.
I'm not noticing any other issues with Gateway, but I'm wondering why this color change happened? Anyone else experience this?
This is a minor thing, but I prefer the blue color :smile:

item.title: Whonix Gateway desktop turned black instead of normal blue color
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

have you tried setting the background back to standard in the settings? Maybe the settings just got overwritten somehow.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
